column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''17''' is the seventeenth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].

* "Words and Devices"<ref>Contents of the column: "Apologia"; "A Brief History of 'Cross-Etymologizing'"; "Conclusion"; "Bibliography".</ref> (column on the relationship of Elvish with Primary-world languages) — [[Carl F. Hostetter]] and [[Patrick H. Wynne]].
* "Essitalmar: The Roots of Middle-earth Names and Places"<ref>Contents of the column: "Quenya Rag".</ref> (column) — [[Tom Loback]].

* "Transitions in Translations"<ref>Contents of the column: "Who's Afraid of the Big, Bad Gollum?"; "The King of Araw"; "Translation Update"; "Wisdom of the Orient".</ref> (column) — [[Arden R. Smith]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
